title: A pamphlet of the offices, and duties of euerie particular sworne officer, of the citie of Excester: collected by Iohn Vowell alias Hoker, Gentleman & chamberlaine of the same
author: Hooker, John, 1526?-1601.
notes: The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron.
Probably issued with his: A catalog of the bishops of Excester: London, 1584.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
